summary:
Decentralized Perpetual Exchange - Trade BTC, ETH, AVAX and other top cryptocurrencies with up to 50x leverage directly from your wallet

 Total Trading Volume - $147,839,405,068

 Open Interest - $80,415,365

 Total Users - 0

 Reduce Liquidation Risks - An aggregate of high-quality price feeds determine when liquidations occur. This keeps positions safe from temporary wicks.

 Save on Costs - Enter and exit positions with minimal spread and low price impact. Get the optimal price without incurring additional costs.

 Simple Swaps - Open positions through a simple swap interface. Conveniently swap from any supported asset into the position of your choice.

 Available on your preferred network - GMX is currently live on Arbitrum and Avalanche.

 Three tokens create our ecosystem - GMX

GM

GLP

 GMX - GMX is the utility and governance token. Accrues 30% of the platform's generated fees.

 Arbitrum APR - ...%

 Avalanche APR - ...%

 GM - GM is the liquidity provider token for GMX V2 markets. Accrues 63% of the V2 markets generated fees.

 GLP - GLP is the liquidity provider token for GMX V1 markets. Accrues 70% of the V1 markets generated fees.
